Package org.spotify.services.interfaces

Interface Service<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity this service will manage
All Known Implementing Classes:
MusicCollectionService, PerformerService, RadioService, SongService
public interface Service<T>
A generic interface for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.

This interface defines methods for managing entities of type T. Implementing classes should provide specific behavior for these operations.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save(T obj)
      Saves a new entity to the data store.
      Parameters:
      obj - the entity to save

    • update

      void update(T obj)
      Updates an existing entity in the data store.
      Parameters:
      obj - the entity with updated information

    • delete

      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes an entity from the data store by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity to delete

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities from the data store.
      Returns:
      a list of all entities

    • findById

      T findById(Long id)
      Finds an entity in the data store by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity
      Returns:
      the entity with the given identifier, or null if not found
